      Instructions(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, MainGame game)
      The Instructions constructor is used to take in a SpriteBatch and a MainGame as parameters and use them in this class for rendering and switching screens, respectively.
      LoadSave(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, MainGame game)
      The LoadSave constructor is used to take in a SpriteBatch and a MainGame as parameters to be used for rendering on screen elements and managing multiple screens, respectively.
